Built-in stylus. Sketch freely, add handwritten notes to photos, and edit images with precision using a push-pen stylus. Up to 2-day battery life. Get creative, play games, or binge watch your favorite series without worry thanks to a 5000 mAh battery. Versatile 50 MP camera system. Capture everything from breathtaking ultra-wide images to extreme close-ups.
6.8" Max Vision FHD+ display. Bring movies, videos, and games to life, and view your notes and sketches in Full HD+ detail.
Fast, fluid 90 Hz refresh rate. View content on a screen that’s smooth and seamless, virtually free from annoying lag.
Octa-core processor and 128 GB storage. Enjoy powerful performance to create effortlessly—and plenty of room to hold everything. Operating System: Android 11
Wi-Fi Hotspot Ready: Moto G Stylus (2022) offers Wi-fi hotspot connectivity in 2.4 GHz , 5 GHz for the best experience. In-box: Moto G Stylus (2022), 10W rapid Charger, USB Cable, Guides, SIM tool.
Sensors: Proximity, Ambient Light, Accelerometer, Gyroscope, SAR, Sensor Hub, Fingerprint reader
body.description: Take your creativity to the next level. Meet moto g stylus. With a built-in stylus, you can sketch freely, add handwritten notes to photos, edit images, and more. Explore without boundaries thanks to a 2-day battery. Capture everything from ultra-wide images to extreme close-ups with a versatile 50 MP camera system. And do it all on a 6.8" Max Vision FHD+ display that brings movies and sketches to life in brilliant detail. With a fast, fluid 90 Hz refresh rate, viewing content is virtually free from annoying lag. Inside, there’s an octa-core processor to power your imagination, along with 128 GB of storage to hold what matters most.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.3 4.3 out of 5 stars 660 ratings 4.3 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this phone
reviews.reviewText: Metro PCS compatible. Sipping was fast and no damage to package.It was easy to set up and transfer everything. Price was affordable and the phone is great. Lots of features and the phone has tutorials it prompts to show you how to use, very handy if you're not technically savvy as I am not. The stylus is so useful. The internal memory is more than enough. Pictures are decent quality. Pairs easily with other gadgets. Great battery life.Definitely recommend.Recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars good general purpose 4G Phone
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as an upgrade phone to a T Mobile account and I've taken the phone cross country. Plugged SIM in and was up and running in a minute. Everything works. Compared to a G Power 2021, higher resolution LCD means sharper images and it shows best in texts. Speedwise its about the same as the G Power, since Stylus is a Mediatek vs Power's Snapdragon. It has a stylus but I just use my finger. Took several hours to upgrade the firmware to the most recent version, as it went through each upgrade spanning a year, finally to Sept 2023, then nothing since then. Solid performer, no lags, lockups, quick response. Battery life 3 days in my use.Main con is no Turbocharger for charging, its 25% slower.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Solid high value phone
reviews.reviewText: If you're in the 98% of phone users, this will work just fine for you. If you're a budding cinematographer then pay 5 times the cost and get a iphone pro max XX. If you're a hardcore mobile gamer then get a Samsung Ultra XX. For the rest of the world this will get your social media feeds, youtube videos, email, texting and those rare voice calls that we sometimes have to use phones for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Still budget phone with very good fitures
reviews.reviewText: I recommend it price and quality, the best life time battery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great phone for the price
reviews.reviewText: My spouse and I both have this model. Trouble free, we don't use it for anything but a phone, and a few apps, so appreciate there is a decent phone at a reasonable price for us minimalists! We like the stylus as it allows us to use the text keyboard more accurately. Bought silicone sleeves and glass protectors separately, happy with the product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GOOD BUDGET PHONE
reviews.reviewText: If you are used to higher end budget phones, this is not a phone for you.If you are like me, always on a tight budget, then this may work for you.Depending on your needs, you may have issues with the quality of the pictures, sometimes the fingerprint reader doesn't read, face recognition works half the time, build feels cheap.But for me it's perfect! I'm going from a Motorola e6 to this and the difference is HUGE!It is a bit big (duuh).At the moment I have DLS23, FC Mobile, Lightning Link games and other banking apps etc. installed and it handles it very well. No lagging.I have the phone for 3 weeks and have no issues.Calls are clear, the speaker is ok, it has more low end and sounds clearer compared to the other phone.What I like the most is the DOLBY ATMOS app! Music sounds zoo much better with this on!Battey life, I don't know about the 2 day, cause if you play games a lot it will drain it.For now, I'm charging it once daily and I play games about 2-4 hours a day on it.So for my needs, it is a good phone overall!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It's a phone.
reviews.reviewText: So I needed a new phone and I didn't want to pay a lot and went with this one, now I don't have a lot of pictures and games like that but man this phone sometimes is really really slow, I've never had a phone that took as long as this one does to start up, it works but I'll look into a different brand next time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good phone, but Google Assistant will NOT work with the screen off!
reviews.reviewText: If you like to frequently use Google Assistant with your phone's screen turned off, or unlock your phone using your voice, this is not the device for you. After spending weeks retraining it with my voice, searching for solutions online, checking settings, etc. I finally found a post today stating that Google has disabled those functions on this phone and a lot of others, supposedly for security reasons.It's a nice phone otherwise; great screen, takes great photos, plenty of space, and so forth...but not being able to ask it from across the room, "hey Google, what's the temperature?" while I'm getting dressed or "remind me in 5 minutes to check dinner" or other things like that is almost a deal-breaker for me.
Hasta ahora funcionando muy bien, venia en su empaque nuevo si esta muy bonito y no batalle para ponerle chip (at&t) buen producto a muy buen precio
Llegó antes de lo esperado, lo cual me parece excelente. Muy buen equipo!

reviews.reviewTitle: Es. Buen celular por el precio
reviews.reviewText: Celular práctico de gama media te servirá el día a día y lo malo que no tiene carga rápida
Compre 1 para darselo a mi hija y quedo muy feliz por el diseño y su funcionamiento. 10 de 10.
